comments:
Build 20020924

I'm not sure how this happened. I don't recall any obvious problem 
occurring; I just found this in my .log file. Since the two exceptions 
occurred near each other, they may be related. Note that there was also a 
VMDisconnectedException reported in the same session which preceded the 
following:

The install count problem has already been fixed (the code now checks if the 
marker exists before attempting to access the install count).

Not sure about the NPE in launch view. The current line 759 
is "getStructuredViewer().refresh(element);". But the implementation cannot 
return null. Thus, I think the code must have changed since the problem 
occurred. Closing, unless reproduceable.

traces.message: Breakpoint does not have an  associated marker.
